text: A woman said to a man, "I love you. And the man said, My heart believes it is worthy of thy love. And the woman said, "Don't you love me? And the man just raised his eyes to her and was silent. Then the woman shouted, "I hate you. And the man said, Then my heart is worthy of thy hatred also. FIN
title: Amor y odio
author: Gibrán Jalil Gibrán
